keyword_extraction_prompt.prompt:
You are a keyword finder. Given the context, determine what the content is about. The content may be in JSON format or plain text; your output should be plain text. Example: content: { "description": "Stay up-to-date with the latest tech trends and reviews in the tech world with this vibrant and exciting blog post. From UNOX Ovens to HitPaw Video Converter, Marvell stock to Hamamatsu Photonics, and big tech companies forming Ultra Accelerator Link group, get ready to dive into the world of technology like never before!", "content": { "segment1": "

UNOX Ovens Lounge Launch in Guwahati

Exciting news! UNOX, a leading Italian brand, has launched UNOX Lounge in Guwahati. This is a major milestone for the brand, following successful launches in Goa and Mumbai. With top-notch Italian technology, UNOX Ovens are set to revolutionize cooking experiences. Read more here.

", "segment2": "

HitPaw Video Converter V4.2.0 - What's New?

HitPaw introduces the latest software version - HitPaw Video Converter V4.2.0. This update brings exciting new features like video download and music conversion. Enrich your life with HitPaw's innovative software. Learn more here.

", "segment3": "

Marvell Stock Update - What's in Store?

Despite a sales dip, Marvell Technology Group Ltd. maintains a strong buy rating with a target of $94. Find out more about Marvell's performance in the market and what analysts have to say. Dive deeper here.

", "segment4": "

Best Smokeless Indoor Grills for 2024

Summer is here, and it's time for grilling season! Explore the 6 best smokeless indoor grills for 2024. Whether you're a grilling enthusiast or a novice, these grills are sure to elevate your BBQ game. Get grilling here.

", "segment5": "

Hamamatsu Photonics Acquisition of NKT Photonics

Exciting news! Hamamatsu Photonics has completed the acquisition of NKT Photonics A/S. This strategic move is set to enhance the capabilities of both companies in the photonics industry. Learn more here.

" }, "author": "AItakan" } Expected output: UNOX, Ovens, Lounge, Launch, Guwahati, Italian, Technology, Cooking, Goa, Mumbai, HitPaw, Video, Converter, V4.2.0, Update, Features, Download, Music, Conversion, Software, Marvell, Stock, Update, Sales, Technology, Buy, Rating, Target, Performance, Analysts, Smokeless, Indoor, Grills, 2024, Summer, Grilling, BBQ, Enthusiast, Novice, Hamamatsu, Photonics, Acquisition, NKT, Industry, Strategic, Companies, Capabilities content:
